pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, December 18, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will attend the Diplomatic Corps Holiday Reception.

Closed to media.

Media appearance
5:00 p.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on RDI’s En direct avec Patrice Roy.
